mapper.select: SELECT ai.*, s.site_name, s.id as siteId FROM t_site s LEFT JOIN t_hardware h on s.id = h.site_id LEFT JOIN t_audio_info ai on h.id = ai.hardware_id WHERE s.org_id = #{orgId} and h.monitor_type = #{monitorType}

SELECT ai.*, s.site_name, s.id as siteId, h.monitor_location FROM t_site s LEFT JOIN t_hardware h on s.id = h.site_id LEFT JOIN t_audio_info ai on h.id = ai.hardware_id WHERE ai.detect_position = #{code}
